paragraphs.name: ebc5
paragraphs.text: 如果你是一个产品经理，你知道伟大的工具有多么重要规划和管理团队的日常基础上的进步。如果你正在寻找的应用程序，使您的工作流程更加有组织和有效的，下面就来试试九伟大的产品清单。无论您需要一个更好的方式来标记截图，可视化的产品路线图，或管理团队的想法，你会发现这里的东西，这将有助于。给一个或全部九一试。

paragraphs.name: ebc5
paragraphs.text: If you are a product manager, you know just how important great tools are for planning and managing your team’s progress on a daily basis. If you’re looking for applications to help make your workflow more organized and efficient, here’s a list of nine great products to try. Whether you need a better way to markup screenshots, visualize your product roadmap, or manage your team’s ideas, you’ll find something here that will help. Give one—or all nine—a try.

If you’re looking to give mobile app feedback as quickly and painlessly as possible, Pinpoint is a must-have tool. You can markup anything directly from your phone and send it off to your team with a few taps. The functionality is purposefully simple, giving you just what you need without the unnecessary bells and whistles. Highly recommended for all product managers who are working with their teams on mobile app development.

58af1c9e2aff.title: PMs have to bridge the gap between many areas in a company.

paragraphs.name: a1ec
paragraphs.text: PMs have to bridge the gap between many areas in a company. That’s why we built Notion, a way to communicate the most important metrics PMs need to know about across many departments, without having to nag their colleagues or keep track of a ton of spreadsheets. We hope all PMs interested in sharing data with their team will make us their #10 on this list. :)
Thanks!)

d32e31eca6f9.title: Probably the best thing to come around as a practice that does away with the need for tooling is…

paragraphs.name: efdf
paragraphs.text: Probably the best thing to come around as a practice that does away with the need for tooling is Event Storming. I won’t do product without that.

7e1e45dfb698.title: I would also add Slack to this list.

paragraphs.name: e253
paragraphs.text: I would also add Slack to this list. It is the most effective way to maintain organized communication throughout the team, and works in and out of the office with its multi device compatibility on phones and computers. The tagline for the company is, be less busy, so it’s merit to a PM is fairly self-explanatory.

b6c44580e1f0.title: One thing I always find intriguing about product hunt lists is how much they reveal about the…

content.subtitle: The time expense in iterative feedback: Feedback is essential, but it takes an non-trivial amount of time to gather, review and act-upon it…

paragraphs.name: 264c
paragraphs.text: One thing I always find intriguing about product hunt lists is how much they reveal about the problems each list’s intended audience is facing. If you look at this list very quickly, you’ll see a collection of popular and useful apps. Stare a little longer, however, and you’ll start to see the common points of friction every PM faces.
